channel.title: Obsidian Generator
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QiQkEpf7-4M
Produces as much obsidian as you want with only one bucket of lava and the only cost is redstone!!

item.title: Obsidian Generator
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[quote=“Cres, post:38, topic:387231”][quote author=whattehp406 link=topic=483034.msg3542736#msg3542736 date=1300985305]

and i restate ;

TNT damage does not add up to eachother :
TNTDMG1 + TNTDMG2 = TNTDMG1
or if you want it in numbers ,
1 + 1 = 1 ( when it comes to TNT damage explosions. )
try it on obsidian , you wont succeed.

what is stated on the wiki is only THEORY , it will never work unless you use mods / change the amount of dmg dealt by TNT or reduce bedrock tnt damage resistance.
[/quote]got anything to prove that?
and he also blew up obby since there is none around

another thing to prove the vid is fake ; the crater is round - like ; this wouldn’t be the case with actual explosions , also i have seen vids with more TNT , no damage to bedrock , the 2nd is fake , give up…[/quote]
Your more of a buzz kill then buzz killington.

Read full topic

or if you want it in numbers ,

item.title: Obsidian Generator
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Cres:

in the 2nd vid , the part where he blew a hole in the bedrock is fake ; bedrock cannot be broken as TNT damage does not add up to a total , its a series of individual explosions.

It states in the minecraft wiki that bedrock can be broken with absurd amounts of TNT.

Read full topic
